definitions.definition: The addition of a methyl group to a molecule .
The addition of a methyl group to cytosine and adenine residues in DNA that leads to the epigenetic modification of DNA and the reduction of gene expression and protein production .

main_definition: ( chemistry ) The addition of a methyl group to a molecule .
secondary_definitions: ( genetics ) The addition of a methyl group to cytosine and adenine residues in DNA that leads to the epigenetic modification of DNA and the reduction of gene expression and protein production .
